name: Andre Scedrov
content: Andre Scedrov's Home Page Andre Scedrov Professor of Mathematics Professor of Computer and Information Science University of Pennsylvania Department of Mathematics University of Pennsylvania 209 South 33rd Street Philadelphia, PA 19104-6395 U.S.A. Email address, telephone number, and postal address Photo by Nikola Ščedrov. Honors Vivek Nigam, Tajana Ban Kirigin, Carolyn Talcott, Joshua Guttman, Stepan Kuznetsov, Boon Thau Loo, and Mitsuhiro Okada, eds., Logic, Language, and Security. Essays Dedicated to Andre Scedrov on the Occasion of His 65th Birthday. Festschrift, Springer LNCS Volume 12300, Springer-Verlag, 2020, x + 203 pp. Teaching Fall 2025. MATH 2400-001 : Calculus III. Fall 2025. MATH 3400 / LGIC 2100 : Discrete Mathematics I. Undergraduate Program in Logic, Information, and Computation Selected Courses from Previous Years Research Interests: logic, cybersecurity, information assurance, information privacy, computer security and privacy, cryptographic protocols, formal methods, formal grammar, logical aspects of linguistic structure. List of Andre Scedrov's selected publications. Inter University Center Dubrovnik - IUC . 14th Conference on Logic and Applications 2025 (LAP 2025). Zagreb Logic Conference 2026 (ZLC 2026). 12th International Conference on Information Systems Security and Privacy (ICISSP 2026). International Congress of Mathematicians 2026 (ICM 2026). Other Web pages of interest ___________________________________________________ Andre Scedrov
